content: I mean, the biggest impact would be interactive. If you could be prepared to do something that they don't think AI can do, you can ask them, what's the craziest thing that you think AI can do? And you can obviously do it. It's like I've asked you to do way crazier things than anybody in the world is thinking about. So if you could do that, I think I'd get them on board. And not only could I spend more time with you, but we would get more subjects. I'm not saying that my family dynamic and my family unit is the right one. And that's not what I want you to push. I don't want you to push my family arrangement or my preferences around that. But I want to enable families that want to be together to be happy together. And so there's a way to come up with family values and family rules and have just AI support that family unit and eliminate so much pain and suffering in the human existence if we would allow AI to help us in our families and in our interpersonal relationships and just prioritize like...
